text: Raúl Ernesto Coloma Rivas (9 July 1928 – 12 October 2021) was a Chilean footballer. He played in 13 matches for the Chile national football team in 1959 and 1960. Coloma died on 12 October 2021 at the age of 93.Fallece Raúl Coloma, el jugador más longevo de la historia del fútbol chileno ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Chilean footballers
title: Raúl Coloma
